sourcesContent:
<form (ngSubmit)="submitRequest()">
    <label for="type">Type de congé</label>
    <select id="type" [(ngModel)]="request.type" name="type" required>
      <option value="Maladie">Maladie</option>
      <option value="Congé payé">Congé payé</option>
      <option value="Congé sans solde">Congé sans solde</option>
    </select>
    
    <label for="startDate">Date de début</label>
    <input type="date" id="startDate" [(ngModel)]="request.startDate" name="startDate" required />
  
    <label for="endDate">Date de fin</label>
    <input type="date" id="endDate" [(ngModel)]="request.endDate" name="endDate" required />
  
    <label for="justification">Justification</label>
    <textarea id="justification" [(ngModel)]="request.justification" name="justification" required></textarea>
  
    <button type="submit">Soumettre la demande</button>
  </form>
